Room.Name: Entrance to the Shadow Grove
Room.Description: Before you, the grove of shadows lies. Giant grey trees are all that can be seen through the thick shadows. A great sense of both power and menace permeates the surrounding area. You have a strange urge to turn back and go back the way you've come. A small path leads north into the shadows and back south to the road.

Room.Name: The Shadow Grove
Room.Description: You are inside the shadow grove. Giant trees seem to glare at you from all sides. The shadowy mist obscures most of your vision. Strange sounds of moaning and growling come from all directions. All exits lead into shadows, you are very confused.

Room.Name: The Shadow Grove
Room.Description: You are inside the shadow grove. Giant trees seem to glare at you from all sides. The shadowy mist obscures most of your vision. Strange sounds moaning and growling come from all directions. All exits lead into shadows, you are very confused.

Exit.Description: You see a small clearing in the shadows.

Room.Name: The Shadow Grove
Room.Description: You are inside the shadow grove. Giant trees seem the glare at you from all sides. The shadowy mist obscures most of your vision. Strange sounds of moaning and growling come from all directions. All exits lead into shadows, you are very confused.

Room.Name: The Shadow Grove
Room.Description: You are inside the shadow grove. Giant trees seem to glare at you from all sides. The shadowy mist obscures most of your vision. Strange sounds of moaning and growling come from all directions. All exits lead into shadows, you are very confused.

Room.Name: The Shadow Grove
Room.Description: You are inside the shadow grove. Giant trees seem to glare at you from all sides. The shadowy mist obscures most of your vision. Strange sounds of moaning and growling come from all directions. All exits lead into shadows, you are very confused.

Room.Name: The Shadow Grove
Room.Description: You are inside the shadow grove. Giant trees seem to glare at you from all sides. The shadowy mist obscures most of your vision. Strange sounds of moaning and growling come from all directions. All exits lead into shadows, you are very confused.

Room.Name: The Shadow Grove
Room.Description: You are inside the shadow grove. Giant trees seem to glare at you from all sides. The shadowy mist obscures most of your vision. Strange sounds of moaning and growling come from all directions. All exits lead into shadows, you are very confused.

Room.Name: The Shadow Grove
Room.Description: You are inside the shadow grove. Giant trees seem to glare at you from all sides. The shadowy mist obscures most of your vision. Strange sounds of moaning and growling come from all directions. All exits lead into shadows, you are very confused.

Room.Name: The Shadow Grove
Room.Description: You are inside the shadow grove. Giant trees seem to glare at you from all sides. The shadowy mist obscures most of your vision. Strange sounds of moaning and growling come from all directions. All directions lead into shadows, you are very confused.

Room.Name: A small clearing
Room.Description: You are in a small clearing in the shadow grove. There is charred grass underfoot, and the signs of fire here and there. It is almost as if the plant life shuns this spot. The shadowy mist hovers all around, obscuring your view into the grove. A small path leads north to some shadowy structure. All other exits are shrouded in shadowy mist.

Room.Name: Entrance to the High Tower
Room.Description: You have reached the entrance to the high tower of sorcery. The tower looms above you at an incredible height. It seems to disappear into the storm clouds above. A diamond gate is to the north, guarded by a huge golem. The trail back south has disappeared behind you.

Exit.Description: The diamond gate looks incredibly strong.

Room.Name: Inside the High Tower of Sorcerery
Room.Description: You are inside the high tower of sorcery. The sight is truly amazing. From here, it is obvious that somehow, the tower is much larger on the inside than it is on the outside. Young mages walk about, completely oblivious to your presence. Exits lead north to the common room, west to the dinning room, east to a plain hallway and back south through the gate.

Exit.Description: The common room looks quite busy and noisy.

Room.Name: Common Room
Room.Description: You are in the common room. There are many apprentice warlocks here talking and resting, playing games, comparing notes. Obviously they are taking a break from their rigorous studies. There are benches, tables and a small water fountain here, otherwise the room is quite unremarkable. Exits lead off in all directions.

Exit.Description: The mages bar can be seen to the east.

Room.Name: The Hallway
Room.Description: You are in a long hallway, it seems rather unremarkable. The hallway continues east and back west.

Room.Name: Dining Room
Room.Description: You are in the dining area of the student mages. From the number of tables and chairs here, you can see that this room could easily seat several hundred people. It is oddly deserted here, obviously not meal time. Exits lead west to the kitchen, and back east.

Room.Name: Dark Hallway
Room.Description: You are in a dark hallway. It is apparent that this area is seldom used by the regular occupants of the tower. Dust covers the floors here. The faint outline of a trapdoor can be seen in the dust.

Room.Name: Mages Tavern
Room.Description: You are in mages tavern. The air is smokey and filled with the smells of foreign food and drink. The other patrons pay you little heed, as they obviously have more interesting things to contemplate. Strick the bartender is here waiting to take your order. The only exit leads back west.

Room.Name: The Magic Shop
Room.Description: You are in the High Tower's store of magic. Tatorious stands behind the counter, selling all sorts of herbs, parchment and other reagents used in magical studies. The only exit leads back east to the common room.

Room.Name: the kitchen
Room.Description: You are in a small kitchen. All the usual kitchen type utensils and equipment is here, including some not so usual ones. Among the later, a huge black oven against one wall, it must be at least 12 feet high. Opposite the oven is an equally enormous meat locker, large enough to comfortably store several hapless adventurers no doubt. In the middle of the room, hanging in mid-air is a spice rack.

Room.Name: Below the trapdoor
Room.Description: You are below the trapdoor. It is very dark and dusty here, very little light filters through from above. A faint sound of dripping water can be heard in the distance below. A rope ladder leads down.

Room.Name: A damp intersection
Room.Description: You are in a damp intersection of what seems to be the basement of the tower. The sound of running water can be heard coming from the south, other than that, an almost tangible stillness fills the air. Passages lead off in all directions, and a ladder leads up.

Exit.Description: A faint light can be seen in the distance up the east passage.

Room.Name: A dark passage
Room.Description: You are at the end of a dark passage which ends in a stout wooden door. Other then through the door, the only apparent exit is back the way you came.

Room.Name: A dark passage
Room.Description: You are at the end of a dark passage. A half opened door is to the east, shedding soft light around the edges. Faint snoring sounds can be heard behind the door. Exits lead east through the door, or back west.

Room.Name: The stagnant pool
Room.Description: You are at the edge of a stagnant pool of water. The smell here is quite nauseating. This is apparently where the denizens of the tower dispose of their garbage. Faint gurgling can be heard from beneath the surface of the pool. Exits lead back north, or perhaps for the very adventurous, down into the pool.

Room.Name: A dark passage
Room.Description: You are in a dark passage, which comes to an abrupt stop at what appears to be a cave-in to the west. It is certainly unpassable, and perhaps quite dangerous just being this close. The only exit leads back east.

Room.Name: A dark cell
Room.Description: You are in a dark cell. Straw and dirt cover the floors here, it is very dark. Someone, or something seems to be chained to the far wall. The only exit is back south.

Room.Name: The Jailor's office
Room.Description: You are in the Jailor's office. It is rather messy here. Judging by the sleeping form of the Jailor on duty, you can surmise that very few, if any prisoners survive long enough to spend much time in these dank dungeons. The only exit leads back west.

Room.Name: Below the stagnant pool
Room.Description: As you dive beneath the putrid waters, you feel a strong tug and a whirlpool drags you under. You are sucked into blackness. You feel your lungs burst from lack of oxygen. Just as you feel your life fading, you notice a change in direction ... and are sucked under by a rip tide.

Room.Name: The hallway
Room.Description: You are in a long hallway leading east and west. The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.

Room.Name: A bend in the hallway
Room.Description: You are at a bend in the hallway. The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.

Room.Name: A store room
Room.Description: You are in a small store room. Assorted junk is piled on shelves or leaning against walls. The only apparent exit it back south.

Room.Name: A broom closet
Room.Description: You are in a dark broom closet. Many straw brooms and other cleaning instruments have been left here, apparently unused (perhaps the maid quit?). The only exit leads back north to the hallway.

Room.Name: A hallway
Room.Description: You are in a long hallway leading north and south. The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.

ExtraDescription.Description: The walls shed a warm light

Room.Name: Guardians chamber
Room.Description: You are in the chamber of the tower guardians. It is rather sparsely furnished, but then again the odd occupants don't look to need furniture. Here and there a disembodied pair of hands or eyes flits about.

Room.Name: A guest bedroom
Room.Description: You are in a small guest bedroom. A small cot is in one corner, and a dusty mirror on one wall, other than that the room looks quite bare, and unused. The only apparent exit leads back west to the hallway.

ExtraDescription.Description: Why, someone seems to be looking back at you from the other side!

Room.Name: A guest bedroom
Room.Description: You are in a comfortable looking bedroom. A small globe of magical energy floats overhead, providing light. A small cot is in one corner looking ever so comfortable, so comfortable in fact ...someone is sleeping in it. The only apparent exit leads back west to the hallway.

Room.Name: A hallway
Room.Description: You are in a long hallway leading from the south. The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by. Stairs lead up to the next level and the hallway leads back south.

Room.Name: The burnt room
Room.Description: You are in what looks to have once been a guest bed room. The walls are blackened and burnt by what you could only imagine to be magical fire. There is no sign of the previous occupant, undoubtedly he left in a hurry. The only exit leads back west to the hallway.

Room.Name: A hallway
Room.Description: You are in a long hallway leading west from here. The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by. Some faint moonlight can be seen in the culdesac to the east. The hallway continues west and stairs lead down to the level below.

Exit.Description: Faint moonlight can be seen to the east

Room.Name: A culdesac
Room.Description: You are in a small culdesac. A window to the east is letting in moonlight and a pleasant breeze. Through it, the surrounding country side can be seen. The only apparent exit leads back west to the hallway.

ExtraDescription.Description: Stretching out as far as the eye can see is a canopy of dark tree tops which can only be the Haon-Dor-Dark Forest. A faint light in the distance to the northeast marks what is probably the city of midgaard.

Room.Name: The Apprentice's Barracks
Room.Description: You are in the barracks of the apprentice magic users. Here and there, a young apprentice sits engrossed in magical study, or practicing a feeble cantrip. Cots line the walls, and the room continues west.

Room.Name: A hallway
Room.Description: You are in a long hallway leading east and west. The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by. There is a door to the north, and the hallway continues west or back east.

Room.Name: The Apprentice's barracks
Room.Description: You are in the barracks of the apprentice magic users. Here and there, a young apprentice sits engrossed in magical study, or practicing a feeble cantrip. Cots line the walls, and the room continues east.

Room.Name: A hallway
Room.Description: You are in a long hallway leading east and west. The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by. Flashes of light can be seen under the doorway to the north.

Exit.Description: A flash of blue light momentarily lights up the doors outline

Room.Name: The apprentice's workshop
Room.Description: You are in a small workshop. Writing implements and parchment are strewn about on a few worktables. In the far corner several young mages have a small kitten cornered and seem to be testing spells upon it. The only apparent exit leads back south to the hallway.

Room.Name: A bend in the hallway
Room.Description: You are at a bend in the hallway. The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by. The hallway continues south and back east.

Room.Name: The hallway
Room.Description: You are in a long hallway leading north and south. The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by. There is a closed metal door to the west.

Room.Name: A classroom
Room.Description: You are in a large classroom filled with bored looking students of the art. The instructor stops in his lecture on the fine uses of magic missile at your entry and lunges to attack you. The only apparent exit is back east to the hallway.

Room.Name: A hallway
Room.Description: You are in a long hallway leading north and south. The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.

Room.Name: A hallway
Room.Description: You are in a long hallway leading north and south. The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.

Room.Name: An empty classroom
Room.Description: You are in an empty classroom. Some strange sigils are written on a blackboard which is floating in the air here. Other than a few desks, it is bare of furnishings. The only apparent exit leads back east to the hallway.

Room.Name: A bend in the hallway
Room.Description: You are at a bend in the hallway. The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by. The hallway continues east and north.

Room.Name: An empty classroom
Room.Description: You are in an apparently empty classroom. A strange feeling of being watched comes over you, and you hear the faint rustle of robes. The only apparent exit is back east to the hallway.

Room.Name: A hallway
Room.Description: You are in a long hallway leading east and west. The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by. A sturdy iron door can be seen to the south.

Room.Name: A hallway
Room.Description: You are in a long hallway leading east and west. The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by. There is a large oaken door to the south.

Room.Name: The Amphitheater
Room.Description: You are in a small amphitheater. Rows of comfortable looking chairs circle a large podium. The echos of your footsteps seem very loud here. The only apparent exit leads north to the hallway.

Room.Name: A hallway
Room.Description: You are in a long hallway leading east and west. The walls emit a faint magical glow providing enough light to see by. A small door can be seen to the south.

Room.Name: The training room
Room.Description: You are in a large training room. It is filled with battle scared manikins , and many other devices used in the practice of fighting.

Room.Name: A bend in the hallway
Room.Description: You are at a bend in the hallway. The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by. The hallway continues north and west.

Room.Name: A dueling room
Room.Description: You are in a large room used for duals arcane. The walls, ceiling and floor all bare the scars of many fiery spells, but still look quite strong and hold fast. The only exit leads north to the hallway.

Room.Name: A hallway
Room.Description: You are in a long hallway leading north and south. The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by. A doorway can be seen to the east.

Room.Name: A hallway
Room.Description: You are in a long hallway leading north and south. The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by. A wooden door can been seen to the east.

Room.Name: The spellmaster's lounge
Room.Description: You are in a large comfortable looking lounge. Off duty spell teachers are here relaxing in their idle time. A large coffee machine is against the far wall. The only apparent exit leads back west to the hallway.

Room.Name: A bedroom
Room.Description: You are in a large, plush bedroom. The owner is obviously someone of high standing in the magical community here. An ice mirror is on one wall, and a scrying globe sit on a stand in the middle of the room. An enormous bed can be seen floating about a meter above the floor. The only exit leads back west to the hallway.

Room.Name: A hallway
Room.Description: You are in a long hallway leading north and south. The walls emit a faint magical glow providing enough light to see by. A glass door can be seen to the east.

Room.Name: The study
Room.Description: You are in a small, well kept study. Ancient tomes are on shelves on the walls, A huge table sits in the middle of the room, with maps weighted down upon it. The only light source here comes from an interestingly non- magical oil lamp. The only apparent exit leads back west to the hallway.

Room.Name: Below the stairs
Room.Description: You are at the end of a long hallway. The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by. A lesser guardian is here keeping silent watch on the entrance to the levels above. Stairs lead up and the hallway continues back south.

Room.Name: Atop the stairway
Room.Description: You are atop a stairway. The halls here look quite a bit less used than those below. Obviously access to these magic filled corridors is limited to those of the upper echelon of mages. The walls here emit a faint blue magical aura which provides some light. The hallway leads west from here and the stairs go down.

Room.Name: A hallway
Room.Description: You are in a long hallway stretching east and west. The walls here emit a faint magical energy providing enough light to see by. There is a thick looking wooden door to the north.

Room.Name: A small office
Room.Description: You are in a small office. It looks like a calligrapher's study, there are quills, inkpots and parchments all about on desks and worktables. A section to the west seems to be curtained off, but the flicker of a candle can be seen through the curtain.

Room.Name: A hallway
Room.Description: You are in a long hallway leading east and west. The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.

Room.Name: The master scribe's workshop
Room.Description: You are in the workshop of the tower's master scribe. Many half finished scrolls lay on the writing table in the center of the room. A giant candle flickering with soft blue flames provides the only light here. The only apparent exit is the way you came in.

Room.Name: A hallway
Room.Description: You are in a long hallway leading east and west. The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by. A half closed door can be seen to the north.

Exit.Description: A dark room can be seen through the half opened door

Room.Name: A store room
Room.Description: You are in a small dark store room. A few common items are stacked upon the shelves here, but very little looks interesting.

Room.Name: A bend in the hallway
Room.Description: You are at a bend in the long hallway. The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by. The hallway continues south and east from here.

Room.Name: A hallway
Room.Description: You are in a long hallway leading north and south. The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by. An iron bound door can be seen to the west.

Room.Name: A hallway
Room.Description: You are in a long hallway leading north and south. The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by. The sharp sound of metal on metal can be heard to the west.

Room.Name: A store room
Room.Description: You are in a large store room. Bins of ores, minerals and other rare materials are here along with many neatly stacked piles of precious metals. A large cabinet with sigils of warding is bolted to one wall. The ring of metal on metal can be heard to the south.

Room.Name: A hallway
Room.Description: You are in a long hallway leading north and south. The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.

Room.Name: A very hot room
Room.Description: You are in a very hot room. Against one wall is a large forge, magical fires crackle within and heavy blue smoke pours into a vent in the ceiling. A rune-encrusted mithril anvil is in the center of the room, looking well used. Other tools of metallurgy hang on a rack which floats about three meters in the air of its own force.

Room.Name: The master Enchanter's chamber
Room.Description: You have entered the master enchanter's chamber. Upon all the walls here are racks of finely crafted weapons. A huge chest with a glowing lock is set to one side. Several unfinished looking blades rest atop a small work table.

Room.Name: A bend in the hallway
Room.Description: You are at a bend in a long hallway. The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by. The hallway continues north and east.

Room.Name: A hallway
Room.Description: You are in a long hallway leading east and west. The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by. A steel door can be seen to the south.

Room.Name: A hallway
Room.Description: You are in a long hallway leading east and west. The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.

Room.Name: A laboratory
Room.Description: You are in a small laboratory. Many strange instruments, vials, bottles and some scrawled notes are piled about a workbench. This room is very untidy, looking almost abandoned, or used by a madman. The only apparent exits are east and north.

Room.Name: A hallway
Room.Description: You are in a long hallway leading east and west. The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by. You can see a steel door to the south.

Room.Name: The Mad Alchemist's workroom
Room.Description: You are in the workroom of The Mad Alchemist. Bubbling braziers, long glass tubes and scores of oddly shaped vials and bottles are everywhere. It is incredibly messy here, crushed glass and other trash litter the floor. The only apparent exit is the one you entered by.

Room.Name: A bend in the hallway
Room.Description: You are at a bend in a long hallway. The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by. The hallway continues north and west.

Room.Name: The pentagram chamber
Room.Description: You are in a large room with a five pointed star etched into the floor. A crackling energy field can be seen to the south, it looks quite dangerous.

Room.Name: A hallway
Room.Description: You are in a long hallway leading north and south. The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by. A bronze door can be seen to the east.

Room.Name: Inside the Energy Field
Room.Description: You feel a stomach twisting sensation as you enter the energy field. Nice going! You might as well wait here until the wizard who built this trap comes back to imprison your soul as well as your body.

Room.Name: A hallway
Room.Description: You are in a long hallway leading north and south. The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by. A bronze door can be seen to the east.

Room.Name: An empty room
Room.Description: You are in an empty room. It is both quiet and comfortable here, it looks like a safe place to rest.

Room.Name: The charm master's chamber
Room.Description: You are in the chambers of the tower's master of charm. Some straw and dirt litters the floor here, it looks to have been recently used by wild animals. Strange sounds can be heard through the bars to the north.

Room.Name: A hallway
Room.Description: You are in a long hallway leading north and south. The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.

Room.Name: The animal pens
Room.Description: You are in the animal pens. Many caged animals are here looking unhappy. Obviously they are destined to be enslaved, or used in some cruel magical experimentation.

Room.Name: The end of the hallway
Room.Description: You are at the end of a long north-south hallway. The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by. Stairs here lead up to the next level, and the hallway continues south.

Room.Name: Atop the stairway
Room.Description: You are atop the stairway to the upper levels of the high tower. The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by. A hallway leads west from here, and the stairs lead down.

Room.Name: A hallway
Room.Description: You are in a long hallway leading east and west. The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by. A silver door can be seen to the north.

Room.Name: A store room
Room.Description: You are in a large store room. Raw materials are neatly bundled and piled here and here. Many freshly cut staves rods and wands of different sizes are here. You can see a silver door to the west.

Room.Name: The master spellbinder's chamber
Room.Description: You are in the chambers of the master spell binder. Unlike other work shops of similar nature, this one is without furnishings or tools. The spell binder obviously needs none for the working of his art. A silver door can be seen to the west.

Room.Name: The spellbinder's cache
Room.Description: You have discovered the cache of the master spell binder. There are two very large silver chased cabinets here, other than that, the room is bare. A silver door can be seen to the south.

Room.Name: A hallway
Room.Description: You are in a long hallway leading east and west. The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.

Room.Name: A hallway
Room.Description: You are in a long hallway leading east and west. The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by. A silver door can be seen to the north.

Room.Name: A bend in the hallway
Room.Description: You are at a bend in the long hallway. The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by. The hallway continues east and south.

Room.Name: A hallway
Room.Description: You are in a long hallway leading north and south. The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.

Room.Name: A hallway
Room.Description: You are in a long hallway leading north and south. The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by. A rusty old door can be seen to the west.

Room.Name: The golem master's workshop
Room.Description: You are in the golem master's workshop. A few unfinished looking humanoid forms of different make are here, some moving, some not. The animated forms lunge to attack you.

Room.Name: A store room
Room.Description: You are in a small store room. Large chunks of clay, stone, wood and many other raw materials are here.

Room.Name: The golem chamber
Room.Description: You are in the golem chamber. Golems made of every imaginable material are here, ranging in size from a hand-span to nearly the ceiling. They all seem to be sleeping.

Room.Name: It is very dark here...
Room.Description: It is very dark here...

Room.Name: A hallway
Room.Description: You are in a long hallway leading north and south. The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.

Room.Name: A bend in the hallway
Room.Description: You are at a bend in the long hallway. The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by. The hallway continues north and east from here.

Room.Name: A hallway
Room.Description: You are in a long hallway leading east and west. The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.

Room.Name: A hallway
Room.Description: You are in a long hallway leading east and west. The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by. An emerald door can be seen to the south.

Room.Name: The master of illusion's chamber
Room.Description: You are in the chamber of the master of illusions. The walls here are ever-changing in color and texture, as if they were reforming before your very eyes. Many splendorous treasures lie all around in heaps and piles, or at least they seem to be treasures...

Room.Name: A bedroom
Room.Description: You are in the bedroom of the master of illusions. Strange looking items and artifacts float here and there in the air. The ripples of strong magic can be felt everywhere. The room seems much larger than it looks...

Room.Name: A hallway
Room.Description: You are in a long hallway leading east and west. The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by. A glass door can be seen to the south.

Room.Name: The meditation chamber
Room.Description: You are in a meditation chamber. It is very silent here, in fact you can not even hear your own footsteps. You feel very peaceful.

Room.Name: A bend in the hallway
Room.Description: You are at a bend in the long hallway. The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by. The hallway continues north and west from here.

Room.Name: A hallway
Room.Description: You are in a long hallway leading north and south. The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by. A blackened door can be seen to the east.

Room.Name: A dark room
Room.Description: You are in a large dark room. The air here seems quite stale, and a sense of extreme dread comes over you. The stench of rotten flesh seems to be wafting in from the open doorway to the north.

Room.Name: A dark room
Room.Description: You are in a large dark room. The stench here makes you gag and wretch. There are body parts and half rotted corpses strewn about with complete abandon. Several operating tables with still forms that resemble nothing you've ever seen alive are here. Tortured screams can be heard from the north.

Exit.Description: Upon gazing northwards, you are filled with deep dread

Room.Name: The Necromancer's Lair
Room.Description: You are in the lair of the evil Necromancer. Undead minions of all types, human and otherwise stand here waiting to do their master's bidding. Some glowing arcane sigils have been etched into walls and floor, no doubt to protect the evil master from his own ungodly creations.

Room.Name: A hallway
Room.Description: You are in a long hallway leading north and south. The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.

Room.Name: A hallway
Room.Description: You are in a long hallway leading north and south. The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.

Room.Name: The end of the hallway
Room.Description: You are at the end of a long hallway. The walls here glow with a faint magical energy which provides plenty of light. Stairs lead up to the next level here and the hallway continues south.

Room.Name: A corridor
Room.Description: You are at the east end of a long corridor. Obsidian walls engraved with ancient runes of power stretch out before you. Magical energies seem to crackle with power all around and whisper in tongues long forgotten, almost as if the corridor it self were alive.

Room.Name: A corridor
Room.Description: You are in a long corridor. Obsidian walls engraved with ancient runes of power stretch out before you. Magical energies seem to crackle with power all around and whisper in tongues long forgotten, almost as if the corridor itself were alive.

Room.Name: A bend in the corridor
Room.Description: You are at a bend in the long corridor. Obsidian walls engraved with ancient runes of power stretch out before you. Magical energies seem to crackle with power all around and whisper in tongues long forgotten, almost as if the corridor itself were alive.

Room.Name: A corridor
Room.Description: You are in a long corridor leading north and south. Obsidian walls engraved with ancient runes of power stretch out before you. Magical energies seem to crackle with power all around and whisper in tongues long forgotten, almost as if the corridor itself were alive.

Room.Name: An intersection
Room.Description: You are at an intersection in the corridor. The obsidian walled halls lead off in every direction from here, pulsing with the power of their ancient runes.

Room.Name: A corridor
Room.Description: You are at the end of a long corridor. Obsidian walls engraved with ancient runes of power stretch out before you. A darkened door is to the east. Tendrils of mist cling to the floor here, they seem to be seeping from under the door.

Room.Name: The scrying chamber
Room.Description: You are in the scrying chamber of the high tower of sorcerery. It is here that arcane rituals are performed to enable those of the art to look in upon denizens throughout the world and spy out their darkest secrets. A huge black cauldron is in the center of the room, bubbling and gurgling, it pours forth a constant stream of smokey fog into the air about you. Here and there on stands of different sizes are crystal balls and oddly shaped mirrors.

Room.Name: A corridor
Room.Description: You have reached an end in the long corridor. Obsidian walls engraved with ancient runes of power stretch out before you. The sound of snoring can barely be heard through the door to the west.

Room.Name: The entrance to the library
Room.Description: You are in the entrance to the great library of magic. A giant desk is here, covered with books parchments and scrolls. Long shelves loaded with row upon row of books stretch out in every direction as far as the eye can see.

Exit.Description: All you can see are books
All you can see are books

Room.Name: In the library
Room.Description: You are in the great library of magic. A strong musty smell permeates the entire area. Upon shelves which float just out of reach are hundreds of books, tomes and scrolls of every possible shape size and color. The elusive books seem to wink in and out of existence before your untrained eyes. It is very quiet here.

Room.Name: In the library
Room.Description: You are in the great library of magic. A strong musty smell permeates the entire area. Upon shelves which float just out of reach are hundreds of books, tomes and scrolls of every possible shape size and color. The elusive books seem to wink in and out of existence before your untrained eyes. It is very quiet here.

Room.Name: In the library
Room.Description: You are in the great library of magic. A strong musty smell permeates the entire area. Upon shelves which float just out of reach are hundreds of books, tomes and scrolls of every possible shape size and color. The elusive books seem to wink in and out of existence before your untrained eyes. It is very quiet here.

Room.Name: In the library
Room.Description: You are in the great library of magic. A strong musty smell permeates the entire area. Upon shelves which float just out of reach are hundreds of books, tomes and scrolls of every possible shape size and color. The elusive books seem to wink in and out of existence before your untrained eyes. It is very quiet here.

Room.Name: In the library
Room.Description: You are in the great library of magic. A strong musty smell permeates the entire area. Upon shelves which float just out of reach are hundreds of books, tomes and scrolls of every possible shape size and color. The elusive books seem to wink in and out of existence before your untrained eyes. It is very quiet here.

Room.Name: In the library
Room.Description: You are in the great library of magic. A strong musty smell permeates the entire area. Upon shelves which float just out of reach are hundreds of books, tomes and scrolls of every possible shape size and color. The elusive books seem to wink in and out of existence before your untrained eyes. It is very quiet here.

Room.Name: Between the shelves
Room.Description: You are in the great library of magic. The shelves seem uncomfortably close here, you can barely maneuver between them. The musty smell is still strong, and the elusive books still hover just out of reach. A faint flicker of light can barely be made out to the north.

Room.Name: The reading room
Room.Description: You are in a small room completely devoid of furnishings. The only thing here is an enormous tome, lying face open on the floor. The great book looks both heavy and ancient. Its jewel encrusted bindings are well worn as the bark of a tree. Spidery writings seem to crawls across the pages, totally incomprehensible to your mortal eye. Something seems to be wedged between the pages.

Room.Name: A corridor
Room.Description: You are in a long corridor leading north and south. Obsidian walls engraved with ancient runes of power stretch out before you. Magical energies seem to crackle with power all around and whisper in tongues long forgotten, almost as if the corridor itself were alive.

Room.Name: The end of the corridor
Room.Description: You are at the end of a long corridor. The obsidian walls come to an abrupt halt at the edge of a golden archway here. The hum of power is so strong it nearly numbs your body. The archway lies before you, glowing and pulsing with energy.

Room.Name: The arched entrance
Room.Description: You feel a slight tingle as you pass through the archway, as if the living magical energies here had infused your body, found it wanting and left. The intense glow from the arch above you is almost blinding. Through the light you can barely make out a stairway leading up.

Room.Name: The landing
Room.Description: You are on a small landing in the middle of a long stairway leading up. Your senses seem dulled here, no sound or smell can be detected at all, and the only thing you can see in any direction is endless stairway.

Room.Name: An intersection
Room.Description: You are at an intersection of several hallways. You feel as if strange mystical forces are pushing and pulling at each other from all around you. The sensation of being trapped, in the middle is almost tangible in the air here. A grey tiled hallway leads south, black tiled east, white tiled west, and a multi-colored hallway swirling with patterns that remain just barely unrecognizable is to the north.

Room.Name: A grey tiled hallway
Room.Description: You are in a grey tiled hallway leading north and south. Dim balls of energy float here and there shedding a warm light, and showing the way. A feeling of peace and balance comes over you.

Room.Name: A grey tiled hallway
Room.Description: You are in a grey tiled hallway leading north and south. Dim balls of energy float here and there shedding a warm light, and showing the way. A feeling of peace and balance comes over you. Large grey metal double doors can be seen to the south.

Room.Name: The antechamber
Room.Description: You are in the antechamber of the master magician of the grey light. A feeling of strong magic floats in the air about you, almost as if you could taste the power held within these walls. Once your eyes adjust to the semi-light, you can make out a larger room to the south.

Room.Name: The main chamber
Room.Description: A feeling of tranquility comes over you as you enter the main chamber of neutrality. Some artifacts are hung on the walls here, or set on stands. The room in general looks both comfortable and official. Probably where the master of neutrality holds audience.

Room.Name: The study
Room.Description: You are in a large study. Shelves filled with many books or arcane knowledge are on every wall. A large oaken desk is in the center, with many parchments and scrolls on it. The most notable thing in the room is a small set of scales, which floats about eye level. In perfect balance, the scales are no doubt a sign of the master's neutrality.

Room.Name: A closet
Room.Description: You are in a small closet. It is filled with many cloaks, and some other apparel.

Room.Name: A bedroom
Room.Description: You are in the bedroom of the master magician of neutrality. Curtained windows can be seen on the south wall. A large comfortable looking bed takes up most of the room.

Room.Name: A dark hallway
Room.Description: You are in a long dark hallway leading east and west. Not much can be seen in the unnatural darkness here, but you get a deep sense of dread the further you go.

Room.Name: A dark hallway
Room.Description: You are in a long dark hallway leading east and west. Not much can be seen in the unnatural darkness here, but you get a deep sense of dread the further you go.

Room.Name: The end of the hallway
Room.Description: You are at the end of a long dark hallway. The darkness here is almost tangible in its thickness. A deep sense of fear and loathing comes over you. A pair of obsidian doors can be seen to the east.

Room.Name: The chamber of darkness
Room.Description: You are in a vast chamber. The walls fade into darkness, leaving you with a very vague idea of the actual size of the room. Swirling here and there in the dark, are patches of pure black which seem to suck in your light and leave it that much darker here.

Room.Name: It is very dark here...
Room.Description: It is very dark here...

Room.Name: Torture chamber
Room.Description: You are in an ill lit chamber. Instruments of torture hang from a rack on the wall, they seem to quiver with anticipation of a victim as if they had a mind of their own. An operating table is here, though it is bare. An extreme feeling of evil permeates the entire area.

Room.Name: The inner chamber
Room.Description: You are in a small dark chamber. Upon the walls are glowing sigils of dark power, scrawled and traced in an evil language no longer known to most of this plane of existence. There is an obsidian altar here which seems to glow, but does not shed any light, in fact it seems to be taking light in.

Room.Name: A bright hallway
Room.Description: You are in a long well lit hallway leading east and west. The walls here are a milky white color, and glow with a warm luminescence, as does the floor. A feeling of goodness permeates the area, and you feel unworthy to tread upon these sacred floors.

Room.Name: A bright hallway
Room.Description: You are in a long well lit hallway leading east and west. The walls here are a milky white color, and glow with a warm luminescence, as does the floor. A feeling of goodness permeates the area, and you feel unworthy to tread upon these sacred floors. A huge set of double doors in finely worked ivory can be seen to the west.

Room.Name: An antechamber
Room.Description: You are in a small antechamber. It is well lit here, though the source of light cannot be seen. It is almost as if the room itself exudes a warm glow of goodness. A larger chamber can be seen to the west, but you do not feel worthy to pass into it.

Room.Name: The chamber of the white light
Room.Description: You are in a vast chamber, its walls floor and ceiling are of an unknown metallic material, the brightest white, almost blindingly stark. A flickering flame is in the center of the room, seeming to feed off of darkness and cleansing the room of any evil. You feel a slight tug at your being as the flame flickers towards you.

Room.Name: The meditation chamber
Room.Description: You are in a small meditation chamber. White silk cushions are everywhere, looking very comfortable. You get an easy peaceful feeling of relaxation here, almost making you want to lie down and fall asleep.

Room.Name: A study
Room.Description: You are in a spacious study. It is extremely tidy here, to an almost antiseptic nature. One would wonder how anyone could study without a mess all around them, the master of this chamber obviously can.

Room.Name: A closet
Room.Description: You are in a small closet. Cloaks and vests hang from hooks in the wall, and a few old boots are all that can be seen here. Rather featureless.

Room.Name: A wide hallway
Room.Description: You are in a large hallway, wide enough to accommodate several people standing abreast. The floor here is a swirl of multicolored patterns, in constant motion. A huge grey metal door blocks the way north, it looks quite sturdy.

Room.Name: A wide hallway
Room.Description: You are in a large hallway, wide enough to accommodate several people standing abreast. The floor here is a swirl of multicolored patterns, in constant motion. A huge black obsidian door blocks the way north, it looks quite sturdy.

Room.Name: A wide hallway
Room.Description: You are in a large hallway, wide enough to accommodate several people standing abreast. The floor here is a swirl of multicolored patterns, in constant motion. A huge white ivory door blocks the way north, it looks quite sturdy.

Room.Name: The entranceway
Room.Description: You are at the entrance to the audience chamber of the grand master of magic. Beautiful tapestries displaying the ancient masters of lore are on the walls, and the floor is covered with a plush multicolored carpet, which seems to rustle and move at the touch of your boots.

Room.Name: The audience chamber
Room.Description: You are in a large chamber. Small bolts of energy leap from wall to wall, crackling with power. The floor is a swirl of indeterminable colors and patterns ever changing. Bright bursts of color seem to explode into the air and fade again at random times. All this splendor plays about and draws attention to a large throne in the center of the room, it seems to be cut from a single enormous emerald.

ExtraDescription.Description: The giant emerald is flawless, and must be incredibly valuable.

Room.Name: A dressing room
Room.Description: You are in a plush dressing room. Fine garments of many styles and some outlandish colors hang from a rack suspended in mid air at eye level. The only other interesting feature in the room is a large silver mirror on a finely crafted gold stand.

Room.Name: The library
Room.Description: You are in a small cozy looking library. A few well made books sit atop shelves which span every wall. A large oaken writing table is in the center of the room with odd papers and parchments on it. The illumination here, to your surprise is a quite un-magical oil lamp.

Room.Name: The altar
Room.Description: You are in a small chapel designed around a beautifully crafted golden altar. Many icons to lesser deities line the room, but it is obvious by one glance at the symbols on the altar, that this room was designed for the worship of Mystra, the goddess of magic.

Room.Name: The treasury
Room.Description: You are in a small chamber, the stale air here is testament to the fact that it has gone undisturbed for many years.

Room.Name: A passage
Room.Description: You are in a small dark passage, which would be unremarkable if not for the fact that it ends in a blinding blue light to the west. On hooks set into the wall here there hang several travel worthy cloaks, and a small leather backpack. It looks as if someone has prepared this room to be used in the event speedy of a evacuation.

Room.Name: In the light
Room.Description: You seem to be floating in a magical energy field, though you cannot see the source of the energy, you can feel its power pushing at you from all sides, completely negating the effects of gravity. An imperfection in the uniform blue can be seen overhead, it might be an exit.

Room.Name: Skylar's Hideout
Room.Description: You are in a small, very messy room. An unmade bed is against one wall, and books and papers cover every available flat surface. Empty beer cans lie here and there, discarded with total abandon. A few over full ashtrays can be seen on a desk.

NPC.name: oldstyle shadow guardian
NPC.description: It seems to be made of nothing more than darkness ...
NPC.longDescription: A shadow guardian screams a challenge and attacks.
NPC.flags: NPC Scavenger Aggressive StayArea AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle adventurer
NPC.description: He looks haggard and sickly; no doubt he's been lost here for quite some time.
NPC.longDescription: An emaciated adventurer is here looking lost and hopeless.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Wimpy Cleric AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle edgar
NPC.description: Edgar says 'pardon me, can you tell me where to buy cups?' You see before you, one of Midgaard's finest fighting elite, the mighty bunny slayer himself, Edgar the Horrible!
NPC.longDescription: Edgar the Human Swordpupil
NPC.flags: NPC Scavenger Wimpy AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle diamond golem
NPC.description: It looks quite strong.
NPC.longDescription: A huge diamond golem is standing guard here.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle mage young
NPC.description: He seems to be contemplating life, love and the mysteries of the universe. Then again, he may just have a headache.
NPC.longDescription: A young mage wanders about, oblivious to all.
NPC.flags: NPC StayArea Wimpy Mage AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle strick bartender
NPC.description: He looks rather harmless, but then again so does a sleeping dragon.
NPC.longDescription: Strick is here levitating drinks to his customers.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea AssistVnum Shopkeeper

NPC.name: oldstyle tatorious wizard
NPC.description: Tatorious winks at you mischievously.
NPC.longDescription: Tatorious the wizard is here counting his earnings.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Mage AssistVnum Shopkeeper

NPC.name: oldstyle ezmerelda cook
NPC.longDescription: Ezmerelda the cook is here stirring a large pot of something.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Mage AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle assistant mage
NPC.longDescription: The cook's assistant is here assisting the cook.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Wimpy Mage AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle prisoner
NPC.description: Though his clothes are all in rags, you can see that at one time they must have been fine garments. A metal muzzle has been fitted over the poor wretch's mouth, whether to keep him from screaming, or to silence his spell casting you cannot tell. He looks quite mad, no doubt he's been mistreated horribly.
NPC.longDescription: A prisoner is chained to the wall here.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Aggressive StayArea Wimpy Mage AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle jailor mage
NPC.description: He looks rather dirty.
NPC.longDescription: The Jailor is here enjoying a comfortable nap.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Mage AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle broom
NPC.description: The broom screams 'Take that you lout!'
NPC.longDescription: A straw broom is here leaning against the wall.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Aggressive StayArea Thief AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle lesser guardian hands
NPC.description: The hands twitch with anticipation of strangling someone.
NPC.longDescription: A pair of disembodied hands floats in the air here.
NPC.flags: NPC Aggressive StayArea AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle guardian greater eyes
NPC.description: The eyes smolder with hatred.
NPC.longDescription: A pair of disembodied eyes floats here glaring at you.
NPC.flags: NPC Aggressive StayArea AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle mage visitor
NPC.description: He looks quite sleepy.
NPC.longDescription: A visiting mage is here snoring away in peaceful slumber.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger StayArea Wimpy Mage AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle apprentice young
NPC.description: She looks quite intent on her studies.
NPC.longDescription: A young apprentice magic user is here doing magical studies.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Wimpy Mage AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle apprentice young
NPC.description: He looks to be oblivious to all but the spell he is memorizing.
NPC.longDescription: A young apprentice is here mumbling words of magic to himself.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Wimpy Mage AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle apprentice young
NPC.description: He seems to be dreaming.
NPC.longDescription: A young apprentice is sleeping here.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Wimpy Mage AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle apprentice young
NPC.description: He looks like a mischievous youth.
NPC.longDescription: A young apprentice is here teasing a cornered kitten.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Wimpy Mage AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle kitten
NPC.description: The little ball of fur looks very unhappy. Singed fur and a few minor burns mark its mottled coat.
NPC.longDescription: A small kitten is here meowing in terror.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Wimpy AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle student
NPC.description: The student yawns.
NPC.longDescription: A student of spells is here looking quite bored
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Wimpy Mage AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle instructor teacher mage
NPC.description: He looks quite angry at your interruption.
NPC.longDescription: The instructor screams at your interruption and attacks you.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Mage AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle student
NPC.description: He blinks in and out of existence, trying to master the spell.
NPC.longDescription: A student of spells is here trying to master invisibility.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Wimpy Mage AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle teacher mage
NPC.longDescription: A spell teacher screams at your interruption and attacks.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Mage AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle student
NPC.description: She looks to have collapsed from sheer boredom.
NPC.longDescription: A student of spells has fallen asleep at her desk here.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Wimpy Mage AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle wizard speaker mage
NPC.longDescription: An old wizard is here making a speech
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Wimpy Mage AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle mage young
NPC.longDescription: A young mage is here learning hand to hand combat.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Wimpy Mage AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle mistress battle
NPC.description: She looks quite rugged. In fact, she more resembles a warrior than a magic user.
NPC.longDescription: The battle mistress is here teaching the fine uses of a dagger.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Mage AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle mage teacher
NPC.longDescription: A spell teacher is here relaxing.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Mage AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle wizard
NPC.longDescription: An aged wizard is sleeping here.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Wimpy Mage AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle scribe mage
NPC.longDescription: A scribe is here working on some manuscripts.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger StayArea Wimpy Mage AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle scribe mage
NPC.description: She's quite cute. Too bad her only interest seems to be the words of lore she is translating.
NPC.longDescription: A scribe is here working diligently on some translations.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Wimpy Mage AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle master scribe
NPC.description: He seems to be so old, his skin has become nothing but a giant wrinkle. The master scribe screams 'How dare you interrupt my important work???'
NPC.longDescription: The master scribe is here looking a little upset
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Wimpy Mage AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle assistant scribe
NPC.longDescription: The scribe's assistant is here folding parchments.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Wimpy Mage AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle master enchanter mage
NPC.longDescription: The Enchanter is here placing a dweomer upon well made sword.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Mage AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle sword dancing
NPC.description: It looks quite sharp.
NPC.longDescription: A well crafted sword lies on the work table here.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle alchemist
NPC.description: He looks like he's been quaffing too many potions. His eyes dart around wildly, and he starts to drool. The Mad Alchemist throws back his head and cackles with insane glee!
NPC.longDescription: The Mad Alchemist babbles something incomprehensible and attacks.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Aggressive StayArea Wimpy Mage AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle master summoner
NPC.longDescription: The master summoner is here holding gateways open to other planes.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Wimpy Mage AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle master charmer
NPC.description: The master charmer sizes you up, always looking for a new pet.
NPC.longDescription: The master charmer utters the words, 'uuuzzldctz'.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive Mage AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle golem wooden
NPC.description: He looks flammable.
NPC.longDescription: A wooden golem stands a silent vigil here, guarding the stairs.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle master binder
NPC.description: The master spell binder snarls at you and attacks.
NPC.longDescription: The master spell binder is here re-charging a blackened wand.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Aggressive StayArea Wimpy Mage AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle master maker
NPC.longDescription: The golem maker is here chiseling some stone.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Mage AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle golem granite
NPC.description: It looks like a statue, until you see it shamble towards you.
NPC.longDescription: A granite golem stands here waiting to do its master's bidding.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle golem bronze
NPC.description: He looks rather dim witted.
NPC.longDescription: A bronze golem stands here shining in the light.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle golem flesh
NPC.description: It looks to be made of a potpourri of different body parts; some don't even resemble anything human.
NPC.longDescription: A flesh golem stands guard here
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle golem cloth
NPC.description: It looks like a bunch of old rags, quite surprising it can actually walk.
NPC.longDescription: A cloth golem wanders around here.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger StayArea AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle golem adamantite
NPC.description: It seems to be forged of dark metal. It looks strong and durable, but somewhat un-intelligent.
NPC.longDescription: An adamantite golem stands here looking very dangerous.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger StayArea AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle golem clay
NPC.longDescription: A clay golem stands guard here.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Aggressive StayArea AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle master illusionist mage
NPC.description: The image of an ugly dragon flickers slightly, and where the dragon was now stands a small harmless looking old man.
NPC.longDescription: An enormous multi-colored three-headed dragon growls at you.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger StayArea Wimpy Mage AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle necromancer master
NPC.description: Attired all in black, the Necromancer is tall and gangly, but still quite an imposing figure. A dark cowl shrouds most of his face, but two blazing embers which serve as eyes can be seen through the shadow. The Necromancer shrieks some obscenities and orders his minions to attack.
NPC.longDescription: The Necromancer is here raising undead servants
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Aggressive StayArea Wimpy Mage AssistVnum

NPC.name: skeleton undead
NPC.description: It feels no pain, and hacks at you ruthlessly.
NPC.longDescription: An animated skeleton screams silently and attacks.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea AssistVnum

NPC.name: undead giant
NPC.longDescription: An undead giant lumbers towards you.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Aggressive StayArea AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle witch hag
NPC.description: She has no face at all, just blank skin, rather disturbing. From about where her mouth should be, comes a disgusting giggling sound that makes your skin crawl with revulsion.
NPC.longDescription: An ugly witch is here scrying out secrets.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Aggressive StayArea Mage AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle librarian mage
NPC.description: He looks like a rather peaceful old man.
NPC.longDescription: The Librarian has fallen asleep at his desk here.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Wimpy Mage AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle apprentice
NPC.description: A powerful wizard in his own right, the apprentice of the master of balance has given up his station in the mage guild hierarchy in order to serve the great master in hopes of gleaning secrets one could never hope to uncover alone.
NPC.longDescription: The master's apprentice leaps to halt your passage.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Aggressive StayArea Mage AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle cat grey familiar
NPC.description: The grey cat cocks an ear towards you, sensing your scrutiny, then purrs contentedly. It looks rather harmless, until you notice its very large claws.
NPC.longDescription: A grey cat is lounging lazily here.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Mage AssistRace

NPC.name: oldstyle master guildmaster grey
NPC.description: He looks quite peaceful.
NPC.longDescription: The master of Neutrality stands here contemplating the balance of the universe.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Mage AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle apprentice black
NPC.description: She bears a wicked looking scar down the side of her face, though once she must have been beautiful, now the scar combined with what seems to be a permanent scowl make her looks quite fearsome.
NPC.longDescription: A black robed apprentice jumps from the shadows and attacks.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Aggressive StayArea Mage AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle cat black familiar
NPC.description: It looks both mean and dangerous. Petting seems to be completely out of the question.
NPC.longDescription: A black cat with its fur up hisses at you.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Mage AssistRace

NPC.name: oldstyle master guildmaster black
NPC.description: The master glares at you.
NPC.longDescription: The master of the black robes is here plotting vile deeds.
NPC.shortDescription: the master of the black robes
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger StayArea Mage AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle apprentice white
NPC.description: He looks like a fanatic. The apprentice screams 'Thou art unworthy of this honor!'
NPC.longDescription: A white robed apprentice screams at your desecration of goodness.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Mage AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle cat white familiar
NPC.description: It seems to be nothing more than a large ball of fluff with claws.
NPC.longDescription: A white cat is here preening its fur.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Mage AssistRace

NPC.name: oldstyle master guildmaster white
NPC.description: He looks like a self-righteous bastard.
NPC.longDescription: The master of goodness is here frowning at your intrusion.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Mage AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle cat calico familiar
NPC.description: It looks incredibly large for a cat, no doubt a giant of its species. A beautiful jewel encrusted collar about its neck is its only adornment.
NPC.longDescription: A large calico cat is here
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Mage AssistRace

NPC.name: oldstyle guildmaster grand mistress
NPC.description: She looks quite comfortable on her emerald throne. Amazingly young and pretty for one of such stature in the guild, no doubt she has kept her youthful appearance through the use of strong magics. The Grand Master pets her familiar and smiles at you in confidence.
NPC.longDescription: The Grand Mistress of Magic is sitting here.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Mage AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle wizard
NPC.longDescription: A wandering wizard is here mumbling to himself.
NPC.flags: NPC Scavenger StayArea Mage AssistVnum
